comments.body:
Is the license file in the source tarball? If so can you add it here?
If not can you add it manually and open an issue upstream?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +30,34 @@  home: http://github.com/ricklupton/ipysankeywidget
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENCE
  summary: 'IPython / Jupyter Sankey diagram widget'

comments.body: You should use the build string from the example recipe.

Thanks, do you mean [this example](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/blob/master/recipes/example/meta.yaml#L33): `{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv`?

I thought I was consistent with [the FAQ](https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes#7-when-or-why-do-i-need-to-use--python---m-pip-install---no-deps---vv): `{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install --no-deps . -vv`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
